remarks: Express equality of equivalence classes in ` ZZ / n ZZ ` in terms of divisibility.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)
statement:
zncyg.y $e |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
zndvds.2 $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Y ) $.
zndvds $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( ( L ` A ) = ( L ` B ) <-> N || ( A - B ) ) ) $.
